welcome_message_body: Welcome to Glasgow, a city known for its rich history, stunning architecture, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore our charming streets, bustling markets, and friendly locals, and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Glasgow International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: T2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 at Glasgow International Airport is a dedicated terminal for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Prestwick Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the terminal for free.
